users

Class Borrower

  • java.lang.Object
    • users.User
      • users.Borrower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Borrower
extends User
implements java.io.Serializable
    Borrower class, a user who can borrow equipments. initial code by: Marc Karassev; modified by: Marc Karassev
    Author:
    Marc Karassev
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Borrower()
      Default constructor, constructs a borrower of type student with an unknown name.
      Borrower(java.lang.String n, BorrowerType bt)
      Constructs a new borrower with an id like "B-number" and the specified name and type.
      Borrower(java.lang.String i, java.lang.String n, BorrowerType bt)
      Constructs a new borrower with the specified id, name and type.

    • Method Detail

      • book

        public Ask book(java.util.HashMap<Model,java.lang.Integer> askedStuff,
       Period p)
        Asks for equipments of specified models and for a period. Creates a new ask corresponding to these standards. The ask should be added to the management system here instead of in the controllers.
        Parameters:
        askedStuff - HashMap in which keys are models and values the asked number of equipment of matching model
        p - period asked for the loan
        Returns:
        the loan instance created
